title: League of One-Shots, I hate how the only viable way to play is to burst someone down SO THEY CAN'T
body:
Literally the only thing you're allowed to do now is play around burst, can you 1-shot the enemy before they can react and 1-shot you instead?

There is no skill anymore, no thought or strategy just: "Oh wow I hit a slow/CC, now let's unload 1 rotation to kill them."

There's a reason I play nothing but shit like {{champion:14}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:99}} now, because they're able to decimate a target with ease so long as you hit their Slows/CC's and it fucking SUCKS. {{champion:161}} is supposed to be a skill-based champ that relies on hitting multiple rotations to whittle someone down, and instead I'm just taking electrocute and Q+W+Ulting them from 75-0 because my shit just does that much fuck mothering damage AND I HATE IT!

And now Riot "I wish I could call them what they are but I'll get banned" Games is fucking BUFFING SHIT LIKE {{champion:107}} AND {{champion:38}} BECAUSE WE TOTALLY NEED MORE ELECTROCUTE ASSASSINS DOMINATING THE FUCKING GAME RIGHT NOW.

GOD FUCKING DAMN IT WHAT HAPPENED TO LEAGUE?!

replies.body: ? I mean the metas before were  "lets cc them nonstop so they cant hit us back till they finally die"
